destinations.name: Netarhat
destinations.summary: Queen of Chotanagpur with sunrise viewpoints
destinations.details: Netarhat offers plateaus, quiet trails, viewpoints and is famous for sunrise. Accommodation: basic guesthouses and a few homestays.
destinations.how_to_reach: Nearest railhead: Latehar (approx 55 km) or Ranchi (approx 160 km). Road access via Ranchi-Latehar route. Best by private car or bus.
destinations.entry_fee: No formal entry fee for Netarhat plateau; some viewpoints may charge nominal parking fees.
destinations.permits: No permits required for general areas; follow local guidelines for protected zones.
tips: Carry warm clothes for early morning
Hire local guide for offbeat trails
Respect local customs and private lands

destinations.name: Hundru Falls
destinations.details: Hundru Falls is a powerful cascade. Take care during monsoon. Local guides provide short treks.
destinations.how_to_reach: Approximately 45 km from Ranchi city by road. Taxis and local buses available.
destinations.entry_fee: No formal fee; be cautious of unsafe edges after monsoon.

destinations.name: Betla National Park
destinations.summary: Protected area with safaris and birdlife
destinations.details: Betla NP has community-managed eco trails, safaris and offers opportunities for birdwatching.
destinations.how_to_reach: Betla is in Latehar district; nearest railhead Daltonganj (approx 25 km). Road connections available from Ranchi and Daltonganj.
destinations.entry_fee: Forest department manages park entry; fees vary (approx ₹50-₹200).
destinations.permits: Safari permits required; book via forest department or local operators.
tips: Book safaris in advance during peak season
Respect wildlife and follow guide instructions

destinations.name: Patratu Valley
destinations.summary: Valley and reservoir views good for road trips
destinations.details: Patratu is known for reservoir views, sunset points and easy access by road.
destinations.how_to_reach: Accessible via road from Ranchi and Ramgarh. Good for short trips from Ranchi.
destinations.nearest_airport: Ranchi Airport (approx 35-60 km depending on route)
tips: Ideal for road trips and photography

festivals.name: Sarhul
festivals.description: Main tribal festival worshipping the Sal tree; marks the start of the new year for many tribes. Community celebrations, dances and rituals.

festivals.name: Karam
festivals.description: Harvest festival celebrated widely in Jharkhand with dance, songs and community feasts.

festivals.name: Makar Sankranti & Pausal Mela (Deoghar)
festivals.description: Religious fairs and pilgrim activities at Baidyanath Dham, Deoghar.
